Articles.Content:
Some engines don't have exhaust plumes or have a weird purple exhaust plume.

I don't know what is causing this problem, but I do think a mod is causing it.

If anyone has a solution, I would really appreciate it.

I made some screenshots and don't know how to upload them to the site (I'm a noobie).

So I created a Google Docs document.

Also included in the google docs is a screenshot of all the mods I have installed in the gamedata folder of ksp.

https://docs.google.com/document/d/12aSxap1Cfy11i3WEqIjoJ75ZCAHJqsvZg0aOcAljHrk/edit?usp=sharing
